caption.title: Potential countermeasures against the methods of attack outlined here, with their likely effectiveness against IBS tiling, IBS probing, and IBS baiting.

tr.td: Require cryptographic signature from genotyping service
Restrict reporting of IBS to long segments (e.g. >8 cM)
Report number and lengths of IBS segments but not locations
Report small number of matching individuals per kit
Block uploads of publicly available genomes
Block uploads with evidence of IBS-inert segments
Block uploads with long runs of heterozygosity
Use phase-aware methods for IBS detection
